MS MCQs

    Secure your infrastructure with threat modeling - Assessment questions

    »

    1. A supplier management program gives me the ability to

      Check how popular the application is

      Understand how long they take to fix a hypothetical security issue

      How much I’ll have to pay


    2. What can you find out by asking questions from the Operations category?

      How often machines are patched.

      The firewall rules in place.

      How long to keep financial documents for.
